sig_info: Once Cull Obsidian’s Rout Buff has expired, it goes into cool down, and can be reactivated after 30 to 15 seconds.

When Rout enters cool down, Cull’s aggression is awarded with a Fury Buff, granting +70.4 to 140.79 Attack for 4 seconds. This Buff gains +0.50 seconds duration for each hit landed while Rout was active.

MISSIONS FROM THANOS: Cull Obsidian has 3 Missions to complete, which may be done in any order. Each Mission can be completed multiple times and doing so grants 1 Persistent Charge.
Mission 1: Break their Defenses: Knockout any Champion.
Mission 2: Crush their Hope: Knockout an Avenger.
Mission 3: End their Resistance: Knockout a Champion above 95% Health without the Combo Meter being Lost during the fight.
THANOS'S FAVOR - MAX PERSISTENT CHARGES: At the beginning of the fight, 1 Thanos’s Favor Buff is gained per Persistent Charge. These Buffs last 10 seconds each and they gain effects based on the number of charges. These Buffs have their duration paused for 1 second each time an attack is landed.
THANOS\u2019S FAVOR BUFFS - EFFECTS FROM: 1+ Each Buff grants +8.8 Attack.
3+ Each Buff grants +32.65 Critical Damage Rating.
5+ Each Buff provides a True Accuracy passive.
8+ Each Buff grants +5% Rout Buff duration.
ON WELL-TIMED BLOCKS: Cull Obsidian’s unique shield is able to Stun opponents with the Parry Mastery even against attacks that don't make contact.
DASH BACK AND HOLD BLOCK FOR 1.2 SECONDS: Cull Obsidian overcharges his weapon to gain a Rout Buff for 8 seconds. This causes his opponent to suffer -100% Auto-Block Ability Accuracy and also grants his attacks an additional burst of Energy Damage equal to 120% of the damage dealt.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 75% chance per strike to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor by 861.54 for 14 seconds. This effect gains +5% duration and Ability Accuracy for each Persistent Charge.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Cull Obsidian’s overwhelming presence reduces the opponent’s Armor Up Ability Accuracy by 100% during his Special Attacks.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Combat expertise grants 10 Combo Shield Buffs. When struck, 1 Combo Shield Buff is lost instead of the Combo Meter resetting. Max: 10 Combo Shield Buffs.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each strike has a 80% chance to pause the duration of all Armor Break Debuffs on the opponent for 2 seconds.
100% chance to Stun for 2 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: An influx of power from Thanos causes Cull Obsidian to re-trigger all of his Thanos’ Favor Buffs.
+8.8 Attack for each Persistent Charge.

100% chance to Stun for 2 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: An influx of power from Thanos causes Cull Obsidian to re-trigger all of his Thanos’ Favor Buffs.
+122.7 Attack for each Persistent Charge.

sig_info: Once Cull Obsidian’s Rout Buff has expired, it goes into cool down, and can be reactivated after 29 to 10 seconds.

When Rout enters cool down, Cull’s aggression is awarded with a Fury Buff, granting +739.32 to 1207.8 Attack for 4 seconds. This Buff gains +0.50 seconds duration for each hit landed while Rout was active.

MISSIONS FROM THANOS: Cull Obsidian has 3 Missions to complete, which may be done in any order. Each Mission can be completed multiple times and doing so grants 1 Persistent Charge.
Mission 1: Break their Defenses: Knockout any Champion.
Mission 2: Crush their Hope: Knockout an Avenger.
Mission 3: End their Resistance: Knockout a Champion above 95% Health without the Combo Meter being Lost during the fight.
THANOS'S FAVOR - MAX PERSISTENT CHARGES: At the beginning of the fight, 1 Thanos’s Favor Buff is gained per Persistent Charge. These Buffs last 10 seconds each and they gain effects based on the number of charges. These Buffs have their duration paused for 1 second each time an attack is landed.
THANOS\u2019S FAVOR BUFFS - EFFECTS FROM: 1+ Each Buff grants +73.2 Attack.
3+ Each Buff grants +38.78 Critical Damage Rating.
5+ Each Buff provides a True Accuracy passive.
8+ Each Buff grants +5% Rout Buff duration.
ON WELL-TIMED BLOCKS: Cull Obsidian’s unique shield is able to Stun opponents with the Parry Mastery even against attacks that don't make contact.
DASH BACK AND HOLD BLOCK FOR 1.2 SECONDS: Cull Obsidian overcharges his weapon to gain a Rout Buff for 8 seconds. This causes his opponent to suffer -100% Auto-Block Ability Accuracy and also grants his attacks an additional burst of Energy Damage equal to 120% of the damage dealt.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 75% chance per strike to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor by 1023.08 for 14 seconds. This effect gains +5% duration and Ability Accuracy for each Persistent Charge.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Cull Obsidian’s overwhelming presence reduces the opponent’s Armor Up Ability Accuracy by 100% during his Special Attacks.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Combat expertise grants 10 Combo Shield Buffs. When struck, 1 Combo Shield Buff is lost instead of the Combo Meter resetting. Max: 10 Combo Shield Buffs.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each strike has a 80% chance to pause the duration of all Armor Break Debuffs on the opponent for 2 seconds.
100% chance to Stun for 2 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: An influx of power from Thanos causes Cull Obsidian to re-trigger all of his Thanos’ Favor Buffs.
+73.2 Attack for each Persistent Charge.
